# Actor Animation
<!--
@name: Actor Animation
@description: 
@tags: 
@categories: 
\-->
Addt an animation sequence for an Actor
## Parameters

- **Index**: Number or name of the Actor
- **Anim&dollar;**: Name of the animation
- **Sequence&dollar;**: Images organisation
---
